name: Escape Friday Night Game
description:
Race through dynamic side scroller levels for as long as your energy can last! Unlock levels and collect coins to take on unique challenges in this Friday night game.

Run through platformer stages with fun mission challenges and compete in real-time trophy races for the top spot! Help Friday Boy and his microphone break out of the Witch's oven as you run to the top!

Collect coins and kill enemy eith your microphone with unique powers and skills, from Friday Boy. Build a collection of sounds to pair with your Friday Boy for an even more exciting time! This Friday Night game keeps the characters coming and the side scroller levels hot!

Explore the magical World of the Friday Boy in this amazing night!
